turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like to place a pizza order to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Meat Lovers for all, and a thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 medium thick crust meat lover pizzas, is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $64, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be picking up, having it delivered, or dining in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'm sorry, i didn't get that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll be picking up the pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
